body:
I had been playing for like 8 months here now. In fact this is the first server I had accessed with my account when my friend (forcefully) told me to join.

But after one month of playing I got accepted as a builder in a creative server (not named) And I began to build there, I made more friends and even got a slightly higher rank. However, whenever I have the time I still play on Avicus. But recently, I got involved in an enormous project and that was it. 100% of Minecraft time on that server. So yeah, I'm going tp quit now because of that.

I'm not trying to be mean, but I find some faulty bits in the server that pulled me away from it. A server usually has good features, this server has lots. However, I felt happier in that other server than Avicus because there is more of a community there, and everyone gets involved. It's not a place where people throw insults when they lost. Personally, not trying to be mean, I like chats with friendly messages instead of tonnes and tonnes of death messages. 

I know that nobody knows me on the server, but I find building better than fighting and killing. Cya :/                                                                                                 

(daymn this font looks fancy)

title: I Quit

replies.body:
Bye Dude

All will miss you

P.S. Have Fun Building :)
replies.body_tagged:
Bye Dude

All will miss you

P.S. Have Fun Building :)

replies.body: Um k. Thanks for getting to know the forums community?
replies.body_tagged: Um k. Thanks for getting to know the forums community?

replies.body:
Goodbye, I didn't personally know you, but it's sad to see a member of our community leave.

Enjoy your life, and good luck!
replies.body_tagged:
Goodbye, I didn't personally know you, but it's sad to see a member of our community leave.

Enjoy your life, and good luck!

replies.body: Hard to judge a community when this is you only post on their forums...
replies.body_tagged: Hard to judge a community when this is you only post on their forums...

replies.body: yeah but ive played with him a few times in game.
replies.body_tagged: yeah but ive played with him a few times in game.

replies.body:
The game community is so different from the forum community. :P Most people don't even consider them part of the "committee" ^-^
Anyways, have a fun time building! ;p

replies.body: How do say bye to someone you've never said hello to?
replies.body_tagged: How do say bye to someone you've never said hello to?

replies.body: As my student teacher said when she left earlier this year "Bye and have a good life!" but in all seriousness, it's sad to see you go m8 and sad to see another one leave the community. Miss you ;(
replies.body_tagged: As my student teacher said when she left earlier this year "Bye and have a good life!" but in all seriousness, it's sad to see you go m8 and sad to see another one leave the community. Miss you ;(

replies.body:
Bye Bye :'( 

You will always be in our hearts :'(

sorry to here that.

Good luck on the other server!
